column3: Direct Issuance Maps refers to assets that are centrally issued by an organisation manually on different crypto networks. Examples of these are USDC (issued by Centre https://www.centre.io/usdc) and USDT (issued by Tether https://tether.to/).
column4: It MUST be ascertained by checking on the central issuers official website or documentation that these assets are equivalent and are issued by the same organisation.
